title: Buffalo David Bitton Men's Straight Six Jeans
description: FASHIONABLE JEANS FOR MEN: These men’s jeans deliver casual comfort and trendy style. They feature a regular rise, a straight leg with a gently tapered silhouette, 5-pocket styling, belt loops, a zipper fly, and single-button fastening.

THE RIGHT FIT: These designer denim jeans for men are made from a premium fabric and feature a slim fit with the right amount of stretch. They come in a variety of washes with unique detailing and distressing.

EASY TO WEAR: These versatile and stylish Buffalo jeans for men are great for pairing with a dressy button-down shirt or your favorite T-shirt. To keep these jeans and their colors fresh, machine wash them in cold water and tumble dry or hang dry.

FASHION THAT MOVES US FORWARD: We make sure our garments are versatile so they have a minimized impact on the world we live in during their life cycle. Wash them only every 8–10 wears to help reduce planet impact and extend their life.

SINCE 1972: Buffalo has always seen denim as a means of expression. We dress you from the “bottoms up” with the perfect fits, finest fabrics, and timeless washes and use responsible practices. This is who we are. We are Denim.

Buffalo creates fashionable clothing that defines you. These straight-cut jeans are perfect for casual workdays or nights out, are made from a high-quality fabric, and come in multiple washes. They feature a slim fit with a bit of stretch, 5 pockets, belt loops, a zipper fly, and single-button fastening.Wash these jeans only every 8–10 wears to help reduce your planet impact and extend their life. Machine wash in cold water with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry on low or hang dry. Jeans using a natural indigo dye may bleed. Wear with care.At Buffalo, each piece of fashion we make moves us forward. Through a deep understanding of our product life cycle and our commitment to repurposing waste to make new fabrics and materials, we ensure that our garments contribute to supporting the world we live in.Buffalo was born of fashion in 1972. Since our beginnings in France, the birthplace of denim, our denim has always been a means of expression. We dress you from the “bottoms up” with the perfect fits, finest fabrics, and timeless washes while having a responsible impact. This is who we are. We are Denim.
